RL Spaces

alpyne.data.spaces

class alpyne.data.spaces.RLSpace(data: Optional[List[Dict[str, Optional[Union[str, int, float, list, dict]]]]] = None, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: object

A generic object containing the core structure for the Configuration, Observation, and Action spaces.

values(order: List[str] = None, flatten: bool = False) → List[Any][source]
Parameters

  • order – a list of names to order the values with; can also be used to get a subset of values. None defaults to the original order.

  • flatten – whether to collapse the values to one-dimension. (note: dictionary objects will their value method called, which does not guarentee order)

Returns

a list of python typed (non-alpyne) objects

Example

>>> Observation(time=720, sample=[11.1, 22.2], myagent={'util': 0.75, 'costs': [-1, -2, -5]}).values()
[720, [0.1, 23.4], {'util': 0.75, 'costs': [-1, -2, -5]}
>>> Observation(time=720, sample=[11.1, 22.2], myagent={'util': 0.75, 'costs': [-1, -2, -5]}).values(["sample", "time"])
[[11.1, 22.2], 720]
>>> Observation(time=720, sample=[11.1, 22.2], myagent={'util': 0.75, 'costs': [-1, -2, -5}).values(flatten=True)
[720, 11.1, 22.2, 0.75, -1, -2, -5]
class alpyne.data.spaces.Configuration(template: Optional[List[Dict[str, Optional[Union[str, int, float, list, dict]]]]] = None, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: alpyne.data.spaces.RLSpace

An object representing the starting values to pass to the sim at the start of each run. Two special features of Configurations:

1. Supports engine-level parameters, implemented as settable properties, and with special names to avoid conflicts. These consist of:

  • engine_start_time: Number

  • engine_start_date: datetime

  • engine_stop_time: Number

  • engine_stop_date: datetime

  • engine_seed: int

  1. Allows values to be assigned as either:

    • static numbers

    • 3-tuples describing start, stop, step (auto-advances to the next step whenever it is queried)

    • generators (retrieves the next value whenever it is queried)

class alpyne.data.spaces.Observation(data: Optional[List[Dict[str, Optional[Union[str, int, float, list, dict]]]]] = None, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: alpyne.data.spaces.RLSpace

A read-only object representing an observation taken from the simulator

class alpyne.data.spaces.Action(data: Optional[List[Dict[str, Optional[Union[str, int, float, list, dict]]]]] = None, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: alpyne.data.spaces.RLSpace

An object representing an action to sent to the simulator. Allows values to be assigned as either:

  • static numbers

  • 3-tuples describing start, stop, step (auto-advances to the next step whenever it is queried)

  • generators (retrieves the next value whenever it is queried)
